entry.title: install ruby on Mac OS X Leopard
entry.content:
1. install brew
    • install brew
    • install git using brew brew install git
  2. install rvm
    • install rvm and ruby
  3. install ruby and manage gemset using rvm
    • install ruby using rvm rvm install ruby 1.9.3
    • getting list of supported rubies rvm list known
    • use installed rubies rvm use ruby1.9.3
    • create gemset rvm gemset create gemset-name
    • use gemset rvm gemset use gemset-name
    • shorthand rvm use ruby@gemset
